channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12228] Backport HBASE-11373 (hbase-protocol compile failed for name conflict of RegionTransition) to 0.98
item.description:
RegionServerStatus.proto:81:9: "RegionTransition" is already defined in file "ZooKeeper.proto".
RegionServerStatus.proto:114:12: "RegionTransition" seems to be defined in "ZooKeeper.proto", which is not imported by "RegionServerStatus.proto". To use it here, please add the necessary import.

This was introduced into 0.98 in e6ffa86e

commit e6ffa86e33ee173afcff15ca4b614e6ec56357ed

Author: Andrew Purtell <apurtell@apache.org>

Date:   Tue Aug 26 08:01:09 2014 -0700



    HBASE-11546 Backport ZK-less region assignment to 0.98 (Virag Kothari) [1/8]

    

    HBASE-11059 ZK-less region assignment (Jimmy Xiang

There's a later fix for this that needs to be applied:

commit 175f133dbc127d7eb2ba5693cc6b2e4fe3c51655

Author: Jimmy Xiang <jxiang@cloudera.com>

Date:   Wed Jun 18 08:38:05 2014 -0700



    HBASE-11373 hbase-protocol compile failed for name conflict of RegionTransition
item.summary: Backport HBASE-11373 (hbase-protocol compile failed for name conflict of RegionTransition) to 0.98

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Setting Patch Available but Jenkins will fail to apply the 0.98 patch to the precommit build.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12674258/HBASE-12228-0.98.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12674258

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 10 new or modified tests.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11305//console

This message is automatically generated.
Any chance of a quick review Jimmy Xiang? This is a straightforward backport of your original change.
Pushed to 0.98. Thanks for the review Jimmy Xiang
